sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The head of the UNESCO office in Ukraine has warned that buildings affected by Russian strikes in the historic centre of Odessa have suffered greater damage than initially estimated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Speaking in Kyiv on Monday, Chiara Detsy-Bardesky presented the preliminary conclusions of a recent UNESCO mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Her team visited some of the more than 50 shattered buildings in Ukraine's Black Sea city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: From the visit, it is clear that the magnitude of the impact on the historic city center is wider than what was initially expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bardeski revealed that Odessa's Transfiguration Cathedral, the House of Scientists and the Odessa Museum of Literature were among the worst hit sites so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: She also acknowledged their deep spiritual significance for the people of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The detailed results of the mission will be compiled in a report to be published in December.

sentences.sentence: Fifteen years after Russia's invasion, Georgia's president led tributes to the civilians and soldiers killed in five days of fighting that left 20 percent of the country's territory occupied.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: For his bravery, he received one of the highest Georgian military decorations, the Order of Vaktan Gorgasal, which he later gave to the family of a Georgian soldier who died fighting for Ukraine. Berdyash Zasadze left the army in 2021 and now lives with his wife and children in a village neighboring one of the Russian-occupied territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Brazil is hosting seven other South American countries at a two-day Amazon summit from this Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The meeting is considered by President Lula da Silva as an historic milestone towards zero deforestation. The first goal is to prepare a joint document to take to COP28 next November in the United Arab Emirates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The summit wants to highlight the idea that saving the Amazon is saving the planet. Oil exploration in the region remains off the table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Petroleum in the Amazon means extermination of entire communities, of lives, of cultures, of wisdom, and we understand that this will only be possible if we defend our communities, and therefore not oil, therefore not exploration in the communities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The leaders of Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Peru, Suriname and Venezuela are set to update the Amazon Cooperation Treaty signed in Brasilia in 1978.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It provides for joint action to balance forest protection and economic development.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to the Brazilian government, this review will emphasize respect for human rights, an intercultural approach and sovereignty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Firefighters on the Italian island of Sardinia continue to battle a series of wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Emergency crews' efforts were complicated by strong winds blowing across the Mediterranean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, around 600 people had to be evacuated from different areas of Sardinia. As temperatures reach over 40 degrees Celsius in some parts of Portugal, authorities said wildfire risks would remain very high or at maximum level across the entire country over the coming days. This week, Spain is facing a new heatwave caused by temperatures that will be up to 15 degrees above normal values for the season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Even locals can't stand the heat any longer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: I want to go on holiday the day after tomorrow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: I'm going to Switzerland to get rid of the heat, because it's quite unbearable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the death toll from days of heavy rains and flooding in Slovenia has climbed to six, police said on Monday, as the country called on the European Union for help with the aftermath of torrential flooding.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: As storm Hans is expected to arrive in Norway on Monday, heavy rains have already began to flood some parts of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And in Denmark, after a remarkably wet July, the combination of wet ground and high winds means trees still heavy with leaves are more likely to topple over during storms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: China recorded its sharpest drop in exports since July 2020 last month, according to official figures released on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sales of Chinese products to foreign markets fell by 14.5% year-on-year in July, shrinking for the third consecutive month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The threat of recession in the US and Europe, plus high inflation, has contributed to sluggish global demand for Chinese products in recent months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Apart from a brief rebound in March and April, exports from the world's second-largest economy have been in constant decline since last October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Police in Thailand investigating the death and dismemberment of a Colombian man whose

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: remains were found in a landfill say a Spanish national has confessed to killing and cutting up the victim.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Authorities on the island of Copenhagen last week recovered several body parts belonging to 44-year-old Edwin Arrieta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On Friday, they detained 29-year-old Daniel Sancho, the son of the well-known Spanish actor Rodolfo Sancho.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The victim and the suspect knew each other before they came to Thailand, police told reporters, adding that Sancho bought knives and garbage bags on his first day in Thailand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sancho reportedly told police that Arrieta was obsessed with him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They also say that Sancho wants to cooperate with the investigation and accompanied officers to several sites, including a beach where he is accused of dumping plastic bags containing body parts Russia plans to reboot its failed moon landing program for the first time in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: almost 50 years it plans to launch a lunar lander this Friday after multiple delays. It will do so with a Soyuz rocket assembled at the Vostochny Cosmodrome in the Russian Far East. The Soviet Union's highly secretive moon landing ambitions were shelved in 1976, and no Soviet cosmonaut ever orbited or landed on the moon. Russia hopes Luna 25 will land on the moon's south pole to take and analyse soil samples and conduct scientific research.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The director of The Exorcist, William Friedkin, has died at the age of 87.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The horror film propelled him to worldwide stardom in 1973, but it was two years prior to that he won his first Oscar for The French Connection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: but it was two years prior to that he won his first Oscar for The French Connection. That also won Academy Awards for Best Picture, Screenplay and Film Editing and led critics to hail Friedkin as a leading member of a new generation of filmmakers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Fans have paid tribute to him on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
